actions.name: AddTagsToStream
actions.description: Adds or updates tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream. Each stream can have up to 10 tags.

actions.name: CreateStream
actions.description: Creates a Amazon Kinesis stream.

actions.name: DecreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
actions.description: Decreases the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records are accessible after they are added to the stream.

actions.name: DeleteStream
actions.description: Deletes a stream and all its shards and data.

actions.name: DeregisterStreamConsumer
actions.description: Deregisters a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream.

actions.name: DescribeLimits
actions.description: Describes the shard limits and usage for the account.

actions.name: DescribeStream
actions.description: Describes the specified stream.

actions.name: DescribeStreamConsumer
actions.description: Gets the description of a registered stream consumer.

actions.name: DescribeStreamSummary
actions.description: Provides a summarized description of the specified Kinesis data stream without the shard list.

actions.name: DisableEnhancedMonitoring
actions.description: Disables enhanced monitoring.

actions.name: EnableEnhancedMonitoring
actions.description: API_EnableEnhancedMonitoring.html

actions.name: GetRecords
actions.description: Gets data records from a shard.

actions.name: GetShardIterator
actions.description: Gets a shard iterator. A shard iterator expires five minutes after it is returned to the requester.

actions.name: IncreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
actions.description: Increases the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records are accessible after they are added to the stream.

actions.name: ListShards
actions.description: Lists the shards in a stream and provides information about each shard.

actions.name: ListStreamConsumers
actions.description: Lists the stream consumers registered to receive data from a Kinesis stream using enhanced fan-out, and provides information about each consumer.

actions.name: ListStreams
actions.description: Lists your streams.

actions.name: ListTagsForStream
actions.description: Lists the tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream.

actions.name: MergeShards
actions.description: Merges two adjacent shards in a stream and combines them into a single shard to reduce the stream's capacity to ingest and transport data.

actions.name: PutRecord
actions.description: Writes a single data record from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream.

actions.name: PutRecords
actions.description: Writes multiple data records from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream in a single call (also referred to as a PutRecords request).

actions.name: RegisterStreamConsumer
actions.description: Registers a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream.

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromStream
actions.description: Description for SplitShard

actions.name: SplitShard
actions.description: Description for SplitShard

actions.name: StartStreamEncryption
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or update server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key for a specified stream.

actions.name: StopStreamEncryption
actions.description: Grants permission to disable server-side encryption for a specified stream.

actions.name: SubscribeToShard
actions.description: Listening to a specific shard with enhanced fan-out.

actions.name: UpdateShardCount
actions.description: Updates the shard count of the specified stream to the specified number of shards.
